website_summaries.verdict: The premium Xerox printer to choose when you need the most advanced features and results possible.
pros: Large paper tray holds up to 550 individual pages at once
Capacitive color touch display makes it easy to change settings on the fly and monitor the printing performance
cons: Printer cannot print on nonstandard sheets as well as other multifunctional home and office printers

customer_reviews.title: No WIFI adapter included (It needs one to connect to it wirelessly through WIFI)
customer_reviews.text: The description specifies that it is wireless but when I received it I noticed that I needed to buy a wireless adapter to make it work. Deceiving practices or description...
customer_reviews.author: Carlos De La Paz

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Impossible to install on Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: The printer has been completely overshadowed by the extreme difficulty to install the printer on a modern up to date computer. Based on the previous reviews I signed up the have the Amazon Installation service do the install. Although a sharp technician, even with the Xerox support on the phone it could not be installed. I still have error messages on the printer and can not do wireless printing. I would not recommend this as anything has to be better. Xerox does not appear to support small businesses or at least this product. BTW, the printer might be okay, just can't tell as yet.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D.

customer_reviews.title: No support who could fix a simple problem
customer_reviews.text: Bought the printer in August of 2018, by March of 2019, the printer died and no could fix, then set a refurbished replacement that arrived broken in a beat up box, and it was also unusable due to what looks like a botched refurbishment. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: alfredholzheu alfredholzheu

customer_reviews.title: Always a problem
customer_reviews.text: We've had this printer for 9 months and there's always a problem. We've had service calls and a service technician came out and it still doesn't work right. Sometimes it prints and the print quality is great, but most of the time there is a problem that keeps us from being able to use it. We are always unplugging and replugging. Sometimes that solves the problem, but usually it doesn't. Never again Xerox. We're back to HP....
customer_reviews.author: our Old Friends

customer_reviews.title: Ink too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Ink way too expensive. Costs as much as the printer. Requires IT expertise to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Printer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I very much like this printer! I've had many over the years, but never a color laser. I bought this one because I used the one we have at work (a much larger printer, for sure) and liked the quality. This is fast, prints excellently, and if I had to, I'd buy this one again! It's rock solid -- prints well, scans well... I haven't had to fax with it yet, but, I'm sure that works well, too. Seriously, I haven't found anything I don't like about this printer. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: Why avoid this printer
customer_reviews.text: I had this printer for 1 year and 4 months. At 4 months after the warranty expired, I had a permanent error there was a jam. So I took the printer to an authorized service person. Turns out the feeder tray went bad. The cost to replace the feeder tray was going to be $445. They recommended it was not worth replacing. We ending up recycling the entire printer. We now have to look for a new printer. What a waste. DO NOT BUY THIS PRINTER WITHOUT GETTING AN EXTENDED WARRANTY!
customer_reviews.author: danyelle lam

customer_reviews.title: Firmware update locked admin account and they want me to pay $350 to reset it
customer_reviews.text: If I own a product I expect to be able to factory reset it without having to pay a service tech several hundred dollars, moreover I certainly don’t want to pay that money when it was a Xerox firmware update that caused the issue. Print quality is nice and it was an ok machine, this and the subscription apps in the app gallery are obnoxious. Even if they reset my machine I’m expecting them to start billing me per page or some other greasy tactics. I’ll never buy another xerox machine again for my offices.
customer_reviews.author: Dan E.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and connect to office computers
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for 2 weeks now, but it works perfectly. Easy to set up and connect to office computers. It should have included a wifi connector as standard equipment -- it's a little annoying that you have to pay for one separately. I added the 2nd sheet feeder which was easy and works fine. The machine seems worth the price so far.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K.

customer_reviews.title: nothing but problems
customer_reviews.text: got 4 months out of this printer xerox wont do a dam thing about it flushed the money down the toilet had to buy another not Xerox
customer_reviews.author: Temecula L.

customer_reviews.title: Setup is easy
customer_reviews.text: Just received copier today. Read all reviews before purchase and was a little concerned about problems people were having during various setups, I have a office with 4 printers and 7 workstations, I found it to be a very easy process for anyone who has some experience with networks. Various aspects setup easily with a rich amount of options.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Boley

customer_reviews.title: Great business machine!
customer_reviews.text: The cheaper printers out there just aren't worth it - expensive ink and low performance to say the least. Xerox has been a trusted name for commercial grade printers for years, and now they are offering a great product available through Amazon. I couldn't be happier with the quality and performance of this printer. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Marty Paris

customer_reviews.title: NOT A RELIABLE MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: Print quality is good for as long as the printer was working. 10 k copies later, it started giving all sorts of errors. Tonner, imaging unit, you name it. Dont buy xerox.
customer_reviews.author: BERNARD

customer_reviews.title: Machine IS A Beast
customer_reviews.text: Bought one 4 months ago. Just bought a second one for another office.
customer_reviews.author: Mine

customer_reviews.title: High end copier/printer.
customer_reviews.text: Great copier/printer! We use it daily and it has been easy to use and provides high quality prints. It is awesome to have a color option.
customer_reviews.author: FramFram Minnesotan

customer_reviews.title: High End Printer
customer_reviews.text: Great print quality, set up can be a bit of a challenge and the "support" from Xerox isn't always helpful. Now that it is set up properly, it's working well. Another downside is that the printer is NOT wireless without an additional $50 piece. I cannot find any information on the Amazon Dash feature that is supposed to be installed.
customer_reviews.author: Meg K

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: good printer, arrived on time, ink is expensive and hard to find
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Halligan

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before buying
customer_reviews.text: Has not worked properly since i bought it. Now im told its because i have a home office and no network. Nowhere does it say "not for home use"!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Printer
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a dream right out of the box. No trouble at all.
customer_reviews.author: Carl B.

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to set up
customer_reviews.text: We have been trying to set up the copier and even after calling in 2 pros, were unsuccessful. Way too expensive for such a headache...
customer_reviews.author: anthony CHAPACOU

customer_reviews.title: good quality, a few months in and the toner ...
customer_reviews.text: good quality, a few months in and the toner is lasting very long. Like the ability to print from IOS and android and one does not need the wireless card to do so, printer and device only need to be on the same network.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Winke

customer_reviews.title: self-sabotaged by its software
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice printer that is self-sabotaged by its software. Not intuitive, not rational; the SW/GUI wastes an enormous amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Jensen

customer_reviews.title: No WiFi
customer_reviews.text: Did not come wi-fi ready but is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to set up - misrepresenting by saying to is wifi, but you have to buy a separate unit - which it hard to understand. Xerox is out in my business!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This product replaced a 20 year old b & W copier only function! Needless to say we can do many different functions with this model. It is also nice and fast. Out IT dept. set it up and it has been running smoothly ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Grauer Orthodontics

customer_reviews.title: This model has a defect. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: We really love this printer, but unfortunately it has a defect in this particular model. We have ordered 8 different ones and every single one of them has had a "Fault Code 092-318: Yellow (Y) Patch Failure." We just bought 2 more of these in July and August and unfortunately the company will not allow us to return or exchange them so we are out over a thousand dollars for just a few months of use. I would absolutely not recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: NMazz

customer_reviews.title: Xerox C405/DN is a Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: The Xerox C405/DN printer has exceeded my expectations in capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Morris

customer_reviews.title: Good printer, reliability unkown at this point
customer_reviews.text: So many things to say. I've printed about 700 pages with this bad boy and had no trouble so far. However, one needs to be mindful of toner costs. As with any printer purchase, please price consumables before making a purchasing decision. There are... shall we say, mixed reviews about generic toner cartridges, and I honestly don't know if they're a viable option at this point. **If you found this review helpful, go ahead and click the Helpful button below! As always, I will update this review if I learn something new. Feel free to ask questions!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Goodchild

customer_reviews.title: Bad machine
customer_reviews.text: Worst product I have ever owned. So far about 20 hours with product support. Have to run the troubleshooter twice a day to get it to print. Not wireless printing, difficult to set up and wont scan vie USB. Loved my previous Xerox, would trade this one for a dell.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Very nice printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer is easy to setup. It prints fast and with good quality. The toner appears to last a very long time, and is at a great price. This printer has all the options you would need out of a printer. It supports printing from phone and computers. The only thing I would make sure you know is that wifi is optional. So if you want to be able to connect it wirelessly you will need the to buy the wifi adapter. The scanner is fast for an all in one. And you are able to scan and send you the documents right from the scanner. You are able to send to your email or other document storage places.
customer_reviews.author: Erica K

customer_reviews.title: Do not use this printer in an enterprise enviroment
customer_reviews.text: They are awful to manage over the network and have problem after problem that have to be resolved with a mix of on site and over the network troubleshooting. These printers cause an immense amount of issues on our network.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: An Overpriced, Broken Down POS
customer_reviews.text: Pros; great print quality and speed. Cons; overpriced, terrible user interface (we downloaded third-party interface app to utilize scan capability), overpriced toner, faulty customer service and worst of all...it broke down 2 years and 2 months after purchased. The cost to repair was 50% of original cost. Our calls to customer service would disconnect before we reached a person to speak with. Consequently, we are one and done with Xerox printers.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Pants

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Worst printer I ever owned. Not user friendly. Jams more than it works. Had to have a tech from another company come out, because Xerox said it was out of warranty. Must have been out from the get-go then. You have to practically tear down the whole machine to get the paper jams out. Can't get it to print a simple envelope. Save your money, there's a lot better working machines than this. Lot of money, for a little work it does.
customer_reviews.author: John Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Better off buying something else
customer_reviews.text: Prints fine when you finally learn to print the thing took way longer to learn the machine than needed if you are looking for ease of use in your machines this is simply not the device for it. My dads 1992 printer works better than this thing. Not to mention all the accessories needed for it. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Fenti

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY FROM XEROX
customer_reviews.text: Printer died after 2 years. Works fine when it did, but their customer support is dead. I called and called and called, nothing, just rings. Thanks for the paperweight Xerox
customer_reviews.author: TN

product_meta.title: Xerox VersaLink C405/DN Laser Color MultiFunction Printer, Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
product_meta.description: Style:PrinterVersaLink C405DN Color Laser MFP (36 ppm) (8.5 x 14) (p/s/c/f) (Duplex) (USB) (Ethernet) (550 Sheet Input Tray) (150 Sheet MPT) (50 Sheet DADF).
feature_bullets: Powerful performance and peace of mind, Right out of the box, you'll count on your VersaLink C405 to consistently and flawlessly perform the tasks that make your business work more efficiently, From IT-free installation wizards, to step-by-step configuration options, you're ready to go-hassle free

Introducing touch screen superiority, By presenting a familiar "mobile" experience - with support for gestural inut and task-focused apps that share a common look and feel - fewer steps are needed to complete even the most complex jobs

Easy, efficient and entirely new, Preloaded Xerox ConnectKey Apps help optimize office efficiency, and on-screen access to the extensive Xerox App Gallery provides expanded functionality—like the Xerox Easy Translator Service app, which quickly translates scanned documents into numerous languages
Total Peace of Mind, Outstanding Xerox Service and Support, with a standard one-year warranty
Save 10% on all ink reorders with Dash Replenishment, Upon activation your printer measures ink levels and places smart reorders when you are running low, No subscription fees, Cancel anytime

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars79 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
